news.title: Chinese developer Yuzhou Group offers bond swap to avert default
news.para: Yuzhou Group offered to extend by one year the maturity of two U.S. dollar bonds due this month in a filing late on Wednesday. It also said it expects a delay in coupon payments totalling $110 million that are due in January and February.

news.title: Developer Sunac China plans $580 million share sale to repay loans
news.para: The Hong Kong-listed developer plans to sell 452 million new shares, or 8.3% of the enlarged share capital, to controlling shareholder Sunac International Investment Holdings, it said in a filing to the Hong Kong bourse.

news.title: Germany asks banks to build buffers as property market heats up
news.para: Regulators cut extra buffer requirements to zero at the onset of the crisis but property prices soared on the back of record low rates and the market is now 10% to 30% overvalued, leaving lenders especially vulnerable to a price correction, the Bundesbank said earlier.

news.title: North Delhi civic body council rejects proposal to raise tax burden on residents
news.para: ​The North Delhi Municipal Corporation also decided not to approve the Commissioner's proposal to reduce rebate on property taxes by 5 per cent.

news.title: Gurugram: DTCP razes 250 structures in 14 colonies, frees 46 acres
news.para: During the drive, the team in presence of police force razed around 250 structures, 16 under-construction houses, four shops, a property dealer's office, boundary walls and road networks.

news.title: Assessment of 12,000 new properties done: Nashik civic body
news.para: An NMC official said the civic body had conducted a survey of all properties around three years ago and found 59,000 new properties which were not under the tax net. “We then conducted hearings of the owners of properties and brought 37,000 properties under the tax net,” he said.

news.title: Pune: Use of treated water mandatory for construction works in PMC limits
news.para: The civic administration passed on order in this regard in a bid to save 100 MLD (million litres per day) water. Even the shopping malls using water-based cooling system have been mandated to use the treated water.

news.title: HC raps consumer panel for keeping Revati Associates' director in jail for 1 year without trial
news.para: Petitioner Suhas Morey, director of Revati Associates and Infrastructure was put behind bars on January 6, 2021, when he appeared in front of the commission in a case filed by respondent Dhanraj Khaparde, a senior citizen from Katol.

news.title: Maharashtra cabinet approves property tax waiver for houses upto 500 sq ft in Mumbai
news.para: It will benefit 16.14 lakh residential units, the Chief Minister's Office said in a statement. The waiver will result in a revenue loss of Rs 462 crore for the exchequer.

news.title: Kolte-Patil Developers' sales bookings jump 77 % to Rs 561 crore in Q3 FY22
news.para: In a statement, Kolte-Patil Developers said its sales bookings rose 83 per cent to Rs 1,238 crore during the April-December period of the 2021-22 fiscal year from Rs 676 crore in the year-ago period.

news.title: Greater Noida: GNIDA told to check maps, approvals of colonies near Surajpur wetland
news.para: ​The move comes after National Green Tribunal (NGT) constituted a panel for remedial action against illegal encroachments near the Surajpur reserved forest, which the state government is yet to notify as a wetland under the Wetland Conservation and Management Rules, 2017.

news.title: Revenue team with recovery notice held 'hostage' by Supertech, probe on
news.para: ​Naib tehsildar Ram Krisha alleged he had gone with his team to the Sector 96 project of the Supertech Group on January 5 on the basis of a recovery notice of Rs 112 crore issued against the developer by the Uttar Pradesh Real Estate Regulatory Authority (RERA).

news.title: SC says Supertech's directors will be sent to jail for 'playing truant' with court
news.para: A bench of Justices D Y Chandrachud and A S Bopanna asked the Noida authority to file additional documents and an affidavit giving the steps taken as on date for the demolition of the twin-towers in Emerald Court project of the Supertech Ltd.

news.title: Owners of problem flats give cautious welcome to UK cladding move
news.para: Housing Secretary Michael Gove on Monday said he wants the construction industry to stump up around £4 billion ($5.4 billion, 4.8 billion euros) to cover the expense of removing the dangerous cladding from apartment buildings between 11 and 18 metres (36-59 feet) tall.

news.title: Sebi to auction Kerala Housing Finance properties next month
news.para: The properties to be put on sale include land parcels and flats situated in Kerala, along with an Ashok Leyland AC Semi Deluxe Airbus, the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) said in a notice on Tuesday.
